summary: Work in progress but a test version are release ;)
descriptionHtml:
Hi!


 [color=#FF0000] \"FLAME\" VERSION FOR TEST RELEASE , Frost and Shock version coming later[/color]

add\'s flame animation on the sword , the \"glow like plastic effect\" are removed
°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°

INSTALATION: unzip in your folder check the .esp and play ;) 
============-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

for flames on the Sword just enchant them with fire enchantement ;) 
__________________________________________________________________________________________

known bug ? I do not know, this is a beta version if you find the bug let me know thank you

__________________________________________________________________________________________

I present my new project for animations flames of the weapons , but I still have to fix some bug (NiBillbord, gravity, etc. ..)

the weapons and flame clor on the picture are examples !

the effect will be directly integrated into the meshes of enchantments (example for fire enchant the flames are orange/red , ice are blue , etc... )

a example on working mod of my animation for weapons can be found here -=< [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6031]Frostmourne with Frost emanation Unenchanted with light fx[/url] >=-
 , but this is a simple emanation and light animation ;) 

-
-
author: Elixiir
